  • Konstruktordetails

    • VertexBuffer

      public VertexBuffer(float[] vertecies, VertexBuffer.BUFFER_USAGE usage)
      Create A VertexBuffer
      Parameter:
      vertecies - the vertecies of the mesh
      usage - Static_DRAW for when the vertecies will not change Dynamic_DRAW when it will change later EG. Sprite Batching

    • VertexBuffer

      public VertexBuffer(float[] vertecies)
      Parameter:
      vertecies - all the vertecies that should be stored on the gpu

  • Methodendetails

    • createFloatBuffer

      public static FloatBuffer createFloatBuffer(float[] data)
      internal code used for sending the data to the gpu
      Parameter:
      data - the data to be sent

    • SetData

      public void SetData(float[] vertecies)
      Sets the data of the vbo to new vertecies. Only works if buffer Usage is set to Dynamic Draw
      Parameter:
      vertecies -

    • SetLayout

      public void SetLayout(BufferLayout layout)
      set the layout of the vertex array for later use by the shader the data assosicated with the buffer layout is later specified when adding the vertexbuffer to the vertex array
      Parameter:
      BufferLayout - the layout of memory of the vertex buffer

    • GetLayout

      public BufferLayout GetLayout()
      Gibt zurück:
      layout of the extra info

    • bind

      public void bind()
      internal code for binding the vertex buffer

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      internal code for unbinding any vertex buffer

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      to clean up all data form the gpu of the vertex buffer
